titles.title: Reduce and End our Deficits Using Commonsense Eliminations in the Defense Exchange Stores System Act of 2011
To amend title 10, United States Code, to require consolidation of the defense exchange stores system.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 2/10/2011--Introduced. Reduce and End our Deficits Using Commonsense Eliminations in the Defense Exchange Stores System Act of 2011 - Directs the Secretary of Defense to consolidate the Army and Air Force Exchange Service, the Navy Exchange Command, and the Marine Corps exchange system into a single organization for the administration of the defense exchange stores system. Prohibits appropriated funds from being used to support the operation of exchange stores after such consolidation.
